original_text: They were continuing to look for Jesus. While they stood in the yard of the temple, they spoke to each other about him. They asked each other, ‘Do you think that he will come to the festival or not?’
korean_text: 그들이 예수를 찾으며 성전에 서서 서로 말하되 너희 생각에는 어떠하냐 그가 명절에 오지 아니하겠느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: They were continuing to look for Jesus.
While they stood in the yard of the temple,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 성전 뜰에 서 있는 동안,

sentences.original_text: they spoke to each other about him.
Do you think that he will come to the festival
